snippet: The new venture will try to provide a level of coordinated, high-quality and efficient care associated with only a handful of integrated health systems.
abstract: Health insurance company Anthem Blue Cross teams up with seven hospital groups to create new health system in Los Angeles area; partnership, first of its kind, aims to provide coordinated, high-quality and efficient care associated with handful of integrated health systems.
lead_paragraph: The new venture will try to provide a level of coordinated, high-quality and efficient care associated with only a handful of integrated health systems.

headline.main: Hospitals and Insurer Join Forces in California
headline.print_headline: Hospitals and Insurer Join Forces in California to Improve Care

keywords.value: Blue Cross and Blue Shield Assn
keywords.name: organizations
